flavorText:
"On the plus side, Throg no longer thinks he's clever."
—Xanathar

foreignData.flavorText:
„Wenigstens glaubt Throg nicht mehr, er wäre smart."
—Xanathar
foreignData.name: Zombie-Oger
foreignData.text: Zu Beginn deines Endsegments und falls in diesem Zug eine Kreatur gestorben ist, wage dich ins Gewölbe. (Betritt den ersten Raum oder rücke in den nächsten Raum vor.)

foreignData.flavorText:
"Lo bueno es que Throg ya no se cree inteligente".
—Xanathar
foreignData.name: Ogro zombie
foreignData.text: Al comienzo de tu paso final, si una criatura murió este turno, adéntrate en la mazmorra. (Entra en la primera sala o avanza a la siguiente.)

foreignData.flavorText:
« Au moins, Throg ne pense plus qu'il est intelligent. »
—Xanathar
foreignData.name: Ogre zombie
foreignData.text: Au début de votre étape de fin, si une créature est morte ce tour-ci, aventurez-vous dans le donjon. (Entrez dans la première pièce ou avancez jusqu'à la pièce suivante.)

foreignData.flavorText:
"Il lato positivo è che Throg non pensa più di essere intelligente."
—Xanathar
foreignData.name: Zombie Ogre
foreignData.text: All'inizio della tua sottofase finale, se è morta una creatura in questo turno, esplora il dungeon. (Entra nella prima stanza o avanza a quella successiva.)

foreignData.flavorText:
「前向きに捉えれば、トログはもう自分を賢いだなんて思っていない。」
――ザナサー
foreignData.name: ゾンビ・オーガ
foreignData.text: あなたの終了ステップの開始時に、このターンにクリーチャーが死亡していた場合、ダンジョン探索をする。（ダンジョン探索をするとは、最初の部屋へ入るか、次の部屋へ進むことである。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ゾンビオーガ

foreignData.flavorText:
"좋은 소식은, 트로그가 더이상 자신이 똑똑하다고 생각하지 않는다는 거야."
—자나타르
foreignData.name: 좀비 오우거
foreignData.text: 당신의 종료단 시작에, 이번 턴에 생물이 죽었다면, 던전에 진입한다. (첫 번째 방에 들어가거나 다음 방으로 전진한다.)

foreignData.flavorText:
"Vendo pelo lado bom, o Throg não acha mais que é esperto."
— Xanathar
foreignData.name: Zumbi Ogro
foreignData.text: No início de sua etapa final, se uma criatura morreu neste turno, aventure-se na masmorra. (Entre na primeira sala ou prossiga para a próxima.)

foreignData.flavorText:
«Но есть и положительный момент — Трог больше не считает себя умным».
— Занатар
foreignData.name: Огр-Зомби
foreignData.text: В начале вашего заключительного шага, если в этом ходу умерло существо, углубитесь в подземелье. (Войдите в первую комнату или перейдите в следующую комнату.)

foreignData.flavorText:
「好的方面是，斯若革不再觉得自己很聪明了。」
～札那瑟

name: Zombie Ogre
originalText: At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)

rulings.text: Zombie Ogre doesn't need to have been on the battlefield at the time the creature died for its ability to function.

Zombie Ogre's ability will trigger only once during your end step, no matter how many creatures died this turn. However, if no creatures have died so far this turn as the end step begins, the ability won't trigger at all. It's not possible to cause a creature to die during the end step in time to have the ability trigger.

To venture into the dungeon, a player moves their venture marker into the next room of the dungeon they are currently in. If they aren't currently in a dungeon, that player instead chooses a dungeon card from outside the game, puts it into the command zone, and moves their venture marker onto the first room.
Moving into a dungeon room will cause its room ability to trigger.
Once you resolve the last room ability of a dungeon, that dungeon is now completed and is removed from the game.
A player may only have one dungeon in the command zone at a time.
The player venturing into the dungeon chooses which dungeon they will venture into. They may choose a dungeon that they have already completed this game.
Dungeon cards are not part of a player's deck or sideboard. In both constructed and limited formats, players can use any dungeon card when they venture into the dungeon.
You can only move forward (well, downward) in a dungeon, never backwards or sideways.
Dungeons are removed from the game as a state-based action.
If you somehow venture into the dungeon while a room's ability is on the stack, you will continue on in the dungeon. If you're already in the last room, complete that dungeon and start a new one.

Choosing the dungeon or room to venture into is part of resolving the venture into the dungeon keyword action. Once that choice is made, players may not respond until after the appropriate room ability has triggered.

text: At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
